title: Digital Detox Yoga Nidra
author: Glo Digital; Inc
description: If it feels like you've been staring at a screen all day, give yourself a much-needed break. This relaxing guided meditation will help you lie back, reset, and rejuvenate from all that digital overstimulation.
cleaned_text: If it feels like you've been staring at a screen all day, give yourself a much-needed break. This relaxing guided meditation will help you lie back, reset, and rejuvenate from all that digital overstimulation.
